headline.main: PRAVDA QUOTES POLES ON SECOND FRONT CRY; Moscow Also Chides 'Emigres' in London on Federation Plan

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Aug. 31 (AP) -- A new appeal for an invasion of Western Europe and a protest against plans for a post-war confederation of Eastern European States were published today by Pravda, official Communist party newspaper, quoting Volna Polsks, organ of the free Polish movement issued in the Soviet Union.
abstract: Moscow Pravda protests plans for post-war confed
